attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cease holding cabinet meetings all around the country, wasting hundreds of thousands of pounds that the country can not afford, to say nothing of the time wasted by all the ministers, when there is a perfectly adequate venue in London where all the ministers are obviously based

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
